title: Episode 75 |  Why Community in Web3 is So Important | Monica Rojas of Upstream | plus DAOs & IRL Events
description:
We talk with Monica Rojas, Head  of Community at Upstream about DAOs, IRL events, and playing soccer in Qatar!
